name: HASH17
description:
You were selected. VP has choosen you. Do you want to be part of the most notorious and dangerous group of hackers there is? Can you handle the responsibility and moral choises that come with that?

Do you want to change the world? VP can give you that opportunity, but it comes with a price.

#######

v0.0.0.2 patch notes:
---- Image overflowing window fixed;
---- Better window system - now you can resize the window from the corners.
---- Image encryption fixed;
---- Improvements at dialog system;

######

This game is under development and is here so I can collect feedback and criticism.

DEV LOG

This version of the game contains only the first "mission". There's some bugs and english typos that I'll be fixing soon. I'll update this page with new versions of the game as soon as i can.

If you played this game, please leave some comment saying what did you feel while playing. Did you enjoy it? Did you hate it? Did you feel like a hacker? Were you stuck in some part?
Any criticism is welcome - i really mean this.

If you want to say something nice, bad or just talk about life, send me an email: it's available at gmail dot com
